member.name: T:NuGet.Packaging.Core.NuspecUtility
member.summary: Until NuspecReader and Manifest are unified, this is a place to share implementations of reading and parsing specific elements out of the .nuspec XML.

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.Core.NuspecUtility.GetPackageTypes(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the package types from a .nuspec metadata XML element.
member.param: Whether or not to use the metadata element's namespace when finding the package type nodes. If false is specified, only the local names of the package type nodes are used for comparison. If true is specified, the package type nodes must have the same namespace as the metadata node.
member.returns: A list of package types. If no package types are found in the metadata node, an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.Core.NuspecUtility.IsServiceable(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Gets the value of serviceable element from a .nuspec metadata XML element.
member.returns: true if the serviceable element is set in the .nuspec file as true, else false.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nuspec file contains a package type with an invalid package version '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nuspec file does not contain the '{0}' node..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nuspec file does not exist in package..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nuspec file contains a package type that is missing the name attribute..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Package contains multiple nuspec files..

member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.Core.Strings.MultiplePackageTypes
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nuspec file contains multiple package types. Zero or one package type nodes are allowed..

member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.Core.Strings.StringCannotBeNullOrEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to String argument '{0}' cannot be null or empty.

member.param: The function to extract the key from each item in the list
An optional comparer for comparing keys

member.summary: Compares two sequence for equality, allowing either sequence to be null. If one is null, both have to be null for equality.
